body_html: Hey, @mkalininait, I designed it like this because I thought the students would only suggest a new conference if they didn''t find any in the list that suited them. But, as you said, this doesn't seem to be the case. I'll change it.

body: Hey, @mkalininait, I designed it like this because I thought the students would only suggest a new conference if they didn''t find any in the list that suited them. But, as you said, this doesn't seem to be the case. I'll change it.
